/*
 * =============================================================================
 * DON'T FORGET TO CHANGE THE DATA LAKE NAME, URL AND PATH
 * =============================================================================
 */

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'demosynapsedls01_europesoccer') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [demosynapsedls01_europesoccer] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://europesoccer@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE     = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE DataLake.GameEventsParquet (
	[id_odsp] varchar(32),
	[id_event] varchar(32),
	[sort_order] int,
	[time] int,
	[event_type] int,
	[event_type_str] varchar(32),
	[event_type2] int,
	[event_type2_str] varchar(32),
	[side] int,
	[side_str] varchar(16),
	[event_team] varchar(128),
	[opponent] varchar(128),
	[player] varchar(128),
	[player2] varchar(128),
	[player_in] varchar(128),
	[player_out] varchar(128),
	[shot_place] int,
	[shot_place_str] varchar(64),
	[shot_outcome] int,
	[shot_outcome_str] varchar(64),
	[is_goal] int,
	[location] int,
	[location_str] varchar(64),
	[bodypart] int,
	[bodypart_str] varchar(64),
	[assist_method] int,
	[assist_method_str] varchar(64),
	[situation] int,
	[situation_str] varchar(64),
	[country_code] varchar(3),
	[time_bin] float
)
WITH (
	LOCATION = 'curated/game_events.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [demosynapsedls01_europesoccer],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat],
	REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
	REJECT_VALUE = 0
)
GO
